Package fko.chessly.player

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    This interface defines a Player able to be used together with the GAME class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPlayer
    This class is the abstract core implementation of a Chessly player.
    AbstractPlayer.PlayerStatusController
    This extends a StatusController to control legal status changes by overriding the checkTransition method and defining legal transition there.
    ComputerPlayer
    A computer player for Chessly.
    HumanPlayer
    A player representing a human usually interacting with a user interface.
    PlayerFactory
    A factory for players.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerType

    The PlayerType enum represent all possible types of players.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PlayerFactory.PlayerCreationException
    The PlayerCreationException is thrown when a player could not be created.
